annotations.description: Creates a CronJob and corresponding Service using an existing Spark image

parameters.description: The name to use for the job
parameters.name: APPLICATION_NAME

parameters.description: The Docker pull specification of the image to run
parameters.name: IMAGE

parameters.description: Command line arguments to pass to the application
parameters.name: APP_ARGS

parameters.description: Application main class for jar-based applications
parameters.name: APP_MAIN_CLASS

parameters.description: List of additional spark options to pass to spark-submit (for exmaple --conf property=value --conf property=value). Note, --master and --class are set by the launcher and should not be set here
parameters.name: SPARK_OPTIONS

parameters.description: The desired number of successful completions
parameters.name: COMPLETIONS

parameters.description: The name of the spark cluster to run against. The cluster will be created if it does not exist, and a random cluster name will be chosen if this value is left blank.
parameters.name: OSHINKO_CLUSTER_NAME

parameters.description: The name of a stored cluster configuration to use if a cluster is created, default is 'default'.
parameters.name: OSHINKO_NAMED_CONFIG

parameters.description: The name of a configmap to use for the spark configuration of the driver. If this configmap is empty the default spark configuration will be used.
parameters.name: OSHINKO_SPARK_DRIVER_CONFIG

parameters.description: If a cluster is created on-demand, delete the cluster when the application finishes if this option is set to 'true'
parameters.name: OSHINKO_DEL_CLUSTER

parameters.description: CronJob schedule in cron format (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cron)
parameters.name: CRON_SCHEDULE

parameters.description: Concurrency Policy for job. 'Allow', 'Forbid' or 'Replace'. (https://kubernetes.io/docs/tasks/job/automated-tasks-with-cron-jobs/)
parameters.name: CONCURRENCY_POLICY

parameters.description: Amount of successful jobs to store.
parameters.name: SUCCESS_HISTORY

parameters.description: Amount of failed jobs to store.
parameters.name: FAIL_HISTORY

parameters.description: Storage access key for Azure BLOB
parameters.name: AZURE_STORAGE_ACCESS_KEY

parameters.description: Azure SQL host
parameters.name: AZURE_SQL_HOST

parameters.description: Azure SQL port
parameters.name: AZURE_SQL_PORT

parameters.description: Azure SQL DB
parameters.name: AZURE_SQL_DB

parameters.description: Azure SQL Username
parameters.name: AZURE_SQL_UNAME

parameters.description: Azure SQL Password
parameters.name: AZURE_SQL_PASSWD
